content: **crocheted coasters for christmas the pieces are worked in drops cotton light ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no cluster-078 yarn group b ----------------------------------------------------------- measurements between 10-12 cm / 4 -4 3/4 in diameter materials drops cotton light from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g color 01 off white 50 g color 31 pearl gray 50 g color 21 light beige the pieces can also be crocheted with yarn from alternative yarn yarn group b see link below drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm/e/4 or the size needed to get 22 double crochets and 11 row on 10 cm / 4 in width and 10 cm / 4 in height
